alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 7:33PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Madison, northeastern Limestone and southwestern Lincoln Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 733 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Hazel Green, or 9 miles south of Fayetteville, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Meridianville, Moores Mill, Hazel Green, Ardmore, Harvest, Elkwood, Belleview, Cash Point, Skinem and Toney. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
